article.title: Equation of state and shock compression of warm dense sodium - a first-principles study

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following EOS models provides the closest match to the first-principles calculations for the principal Hugoniot of sodium at temperatures above 200 GPa?
According to the figure, what is the approximate temperature range covered by the PIMC and DFT-MD simulations for sodium?
How many compression peak maxima are predicted by the first-principles calculations along each Hugoniot curve for sodium?
What is the approximate maximum compression ratio (ρ/ρο) reached along the principal Hugoniot curve of sodium according to the first-principles calculations?
